<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9411</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Les vacances en France</string>
            <string language="es">Les vacances en France</string>
            <string language="ga">Les vacances en France</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Les vacances en Frankreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En France de vacances de Les</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">En France dos vacances de Les</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">En Francia di vacances di Les</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Vacances EN Γαλλία Les</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students can test themselves on travel, tourism and holidays in France.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes pueden comprobar sus conocimientos por sí mismos referentes a viajes, turismo y vacaciones en Francia.</string>
            <string language="ga">Féadfaidh daltaí iad féin a thástáil ar thaisteal, turasóireacht agus laethanta saoire sa Fhrainc.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">French</string>
            <string language="es">Francés</string>
            <string language="ga">Fraincis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können auf Spielraum, Tourismus 
und Feiertagen in Frankreich sich prüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent se tester le voyage, le 
tourisme et les vacances en France.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem testar-se no curso, no tourism
e nos feriados em France.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi possono esaminarsi sulla corsa, sul 
turismo e sulle feste in Francia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να εξεταστούν στο ταξίδι, τον 
τουρισμό και τις διακοπές στη Γαλλία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
